author: dantraMSFT
body:
startCoreCLR in coreclrutil.cpp (https://github.com/PowerShell/psl-omi-provider/blob/master/src/coreclrutil.cpp#L191) finds powershell's coreclr binary using the powershell binary. The change in name to pwsh breaks this logic.

$PSVersionTable
Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      6.0.0-beta.9
PSEdition                      Core
GitCommitId                    v6.0.0-beta.9
OS                             Linux 4.4.0-97-generic #120-Ubuntu SMP Tue Sep 19 17:28:18 UTC 2017
Platform                       Unix
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
WSManStackVersion              3.0

comments.author: dantraMSFT
comments.body: NOTE: Closing this is pending a PSRP release; currently blocked due to 3 issues in libMI.

title: PowerShell Beta 9 causes a regression in the PSRP omi provider due to the name change to pswh.
